question: Q604
question_text: Does CKM/PMNS mixing arise from delta differences?
key_insight: Mass and mixing are UNIFIED - both from Koide theta structure
why_ckm_small_pmns_large: CKM: both sectors colored. PMNS: different EM/weak couplings
implications: CP violation may also be algebraic

new_questions.Q605: Can the CP-violating phase be derived algebraically?
new_questions.Q606: Why is theta_23 near maximal (45 deg)?
new_questions.Q607: Can V_cb and V_ub be derived from similar formulas?
new_questions.Q608: Does the seesaw scale emerge from delta differences?
